title: Book Review: ‘The Song of the Cell,’ by Siddhartha Mukherjee
description: “The Song of the Cell,” the latest work by the Pulitzer Prize-winning oncologist, recounts our evolving understanding of the body’s smallest structural and functional unit — and its implications for everything from immune therapy and in vitro fertilization to Covid-19.
dc:creator: Jennifer Szalai
category: The Song of the Cell: An Exploration of Medicine and the New Human (Book)
